Name: SNOMEDCTAdditionalDosageInstructions
Title: SNOMED CT Additional Dosage Instructions
Descriptino: This value set includes all SNOMED CT Additional Dosage Instructions.

Name: SNOMEDCTAdministrationMethodCodes
Title: SNOMED CT Administration Method Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes some method codes from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar

Name: AdministrativeGender
Title: AdministrativeGender
Descriptino: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

Name: AdverseEventActuality
Title: Adverse Event Actuality
Descriptino: Overall nature of the adverse event, e.g. real or potential.

Name: AdverseEventCategory
Title: Adverse Event Category
Descriptino: Overall categorization of the event, e.g. product-related or situational.

Name: AdverseEventCausalityMethod
Title: Adverse Event Causality Method
Descriptino: TODO.

Name: AdverseEventContributingFactor
Title: AdverseEvent Contributing Factor
Descriptino: This value set includes codes that describe the contributing factors suspected to have increased the probability or severity of the adverse event.

Name: AdverseEventMitigatingAction
Title: AdverseEvent Mitigating Action
Descriptino: This value set includes codes that describe the ameliorating actions taken after the adverse event occured in order to reduce the extent of harm.

Name: AdverseEventParticipantFunction
Title: AdverseEvent Participant Function
Descriptino: This value set includes codes that describe the type of involvement of the actor in the adverse event.

Name: AdverseEventPreventiveAction
Title: AdverseEvent Preventive Action
Descriptino: This value set includes codes that describe the preventive actions that contributed to avoiding the adverse event.

Name: AdverseEventStatus
Title: Adverse Event Status
Descriptino: Codes identifying the lifecycle stage of an adverse event.

Name: AdverseEventSupportingInforation
Title: AdverseEvent Supporting Information
Descriptino: This value set includes codes that describe the supporting information relevant to the event.

Name: AllLanguages
Title: All Languages
Descriptino: This value set includes all possible codes from BCP-47 (see http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

Name: AllergyIntoleranceCategory
Title: Allergy Intolerance Category
Descriptino: Category of an identified substance associated with allergies or intolerances.

Name: AllergyIntoleranceCriticality
Title: Allergy Intolerance Criticality
Descriptino: Estimate of the potential clinical harm, or seriousness, of a reaction to an identified substance.

Name: AllergyIntoleranceType
Title: Allergy Intolerance Type
Descriptino: Identification of the underlying physiological mechanism for a Reaction Risk.

Name: AllergyIntoleranceClinicalStatusCodes
Title: AllergyIntolerance Clinical Status Codes
Descriptino: Preferred value set for AllergyIntolerance Clinical Status.

Name: SubstanceProductAndConditionAndNegationCodes
Title: AllergyIntolerance Substance/Product
Descriptino: Condition and Negation Codes
Uses: This value set includes concept codes for specific substances/pharmaceutical products, allergy or intolerance conditions, and negation/exclusion codes to specify the absence of specific types of allergies or intolerances.

Name: AllergyIntoleranceVerificationStatus
Title: AllergyIntolerance Verification Status
Descriptino: The verification status to support or decline the clinical status of the allergy or intolerance.

Name: SNOMEDCTAnatomicalStructureAdministrationSites
Title: SNOMED CT Anatomical Structure for Administration Site Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes Anatomical Structure codes from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar.

Name: SNOMEDCTClinicalFindings
Title: SNOMED CT Clinical Findings
Descriptino: This value set includes all the "Clinical finding" [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) codes - concepts where concept is-a 404684003 (Clinical finding (finding)).

Name: ConditionProblemDiagnosisCodes
Title: Condition/Problem/Diagnosis Codes
Descriptino: Example value set for Condition/Problem/Diagnosis codes.

Name: CommonLanguages
Title: Common Languages
Descriptino: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (see http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

Name: LinkType
Title: Link Type
Descriptino: The type of link between this Patient resource and another Patient/RelatedPerson resource.

Name: MaritalStatusCodes
Title: Marital Status Codes
Descriptino: This value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate the marital status of a person.

Name: SNOMEDCTMedicationAsNeededReasonCodes
Title: SNOMED CT Medication As Needed Reason Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes all clinical findings from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar value set.

Name: SNOMEDCTMedicationCodes
Title: SNOMED CT Medication Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes all drug or medicament substance codes and all pharmaceutical/biologic products from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar value set.

Name: MedicationStatementAdherenceCodes
Title: MedicationStatement Adherence Codes
Descriptino: MedicationStatement Adherence Codes

Name: MedicationStatementStatusCodes
Title: MedicationStatement Status Codes
Descriptino: MedicationStatement Status Codes

Name: MedicationRequestAdministrationLocationCodes
Title: medicationRequest Administration Location Codes
Descriptino: MedicationRequest Administration Location Codes

Name: ParticipationRoleType
Title: Participation Role Type
Descriptino: This FHIR value set is comprised of Actor participation Type codes, which can be used to value FHIR agents, actors, and other role elements. The codes are intended to express how the agent participated in some activity. Sometimes refered to the agent functional-role relative to the activity.

Name: PatientContactRelationship
Title: Patient Contact Relationship
Descriptino: The nature of the relationship between the patient and the contact person.

Name: AllergyIntoleranceSeverity
Title: Allergy Intolerance Severity
Descriptino: Clinical assessment of the severity of a reaction event as a whole, potentially considering multiple different manifestations.

Name: SNOMEDCTDrugTherapyStatusCodes
Title: SNOMED CT Drug Therapy Status codes
Descriptino: This value set includes some taken and not taken reason codes from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar

Name: SNOMEDCTRouteCodes
Title: SNOMED CT Route Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes all Route codes from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar.

Name: SubstanceCode
Title: Substance Code
Descriptino: This value set contains concept codes for specific substances. It includes codes from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 105590001 (Substance (substance))

Name: DoseAndRateType
Title: DoseAndRateType
Descriptino: The kind of dose or rate specified.

Name: Hl7VSDegreeLicenseCertificate
Title: hl7VS-degreeLicenseCertificate
Descriptino: Concepts specifying an educational degree (e.g., MD).  Used in the CNN datatype (names and identifiers of clinicians) in Version 2 messaging.  Used in Version 2 messaging; note that in releases of HL7 prior to 2.3.1, was also used in person names (XPN), but this use was deprecated, then withdrawn in 2.7.
